com.kstechnologies.nirscannanolibrary

Class KSTNanoSDK.ReferenceCalibration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kstechnologies.nirscannanolibrary.KSTNanoSDK.ReferenceCalibration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    KSTNanoSDK

    public static class KSTNanoSDK.ReferenceCalibration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Custom class for Reference calibration objects. This object is created when the Nano is first connected to, every time a connection is made. This class implements serializable so that it can be saved if desired. WARNING: This class is used by the Spectrum C library and must not change names or move from the current directory
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
